title: My shop
body:
I'm very grateful for you guys finding a way to open the shop on the new client. So excited that I bought all of the skins except two.
I'm only one RP short of all the skins I got in My Shop RIOT PLEASE HELP ME. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I sent in a ticket. If you guys could help me I'd be extremely grateful. I've been playing this game for a few years now and I'm still enjoying it after all this time.

We might be able to work something out!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport), and we'll see what we can do!
